page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is{Stephen Stanford.}I am 11 years old. My day started at 7 a.m. I got dressed and had some breakfast. At 7.15 I fed my hamster. Then I cleaned my teeth and at about 7.30 I fed my ducklings and ducks. At 8 a.m. I left for school. I caught the school bus in {Poole Keynes.}When I got to school, I had a little playtime. I had an assembly. After that we had a spelling test and I worked on the {Domesday Survey.}At 10.30 I had a playtime. Then I did some maths and some{Domesday }work. At midday, I had my school dinner. Afterwards I had half an hour's playtime. After that I had sports. At 3.30 p.m. I caught the bus home. I changed and went out to play. At about 5 I had my tea. Then I fed my ducks. I watched television. At 8 p.m. I shut my ducks in and went to bed at 9 p.m.
